name: Fresh Leaf Kathurumurunga
description: The leaves are rich in Vitamin E and have the properties to kill germs, bacteria, and clear poison. The Kathurumurunga leaves can be made into a delicious tea which has antibiotic properties. The juice of the leaves is used for the treatment of nausea, gout, and itchiness and leprosy.  *Images for illustration purpose only. Products received may vary.
